criteria: Adherence to digital safety guidelines and protocols.

Engages in inappropriate or harmful online behavior.

Generally communicates respectfully online; avoids engaging in harmful behavior.
Consistently communicates respectfully and responsibly online, demonstrating empathy and understanding.
